name: The Fool's Queen
description:
Don't anger the almighty queen, you poor, poor fool.

This is a game literally based on 2 Tarot Cards: Queen of Pentacles and Fool (hence the name, the Queen's Fool).

Art:

  • Art by: Svetlana Kushnariova, lana-chan@yandex.ru
